name: throwdown
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a competition, an argument with someone, or a fight involving physical violence: The film was widely regarded as the favourite in the best-picture throwdown. have a throwdown Tony and Bobby had a major throwdown one drunken night with their wives screaming at them to stop.throwdown with She had a throwdown with a doorman at a popular nightclub who wouldn't let her in.
More examplesFewer examplesIt turned into a chilli throwdown to see who had the best recipe.They have a crazy – mildly bloody – throwdown at the end of the movie.There is the sound of gunfire, shattering wood, and glass rattling on wooden tables when Holmes and Dr Watson get in a throwdown.
